full_summary:
**Junior Information/Records Management Specialist - Tender Notice**
=====================================================

**Awarded Bidder**: None

**Notice ID**: NRCan-5000074817

**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Publication Date**: June 15, 2023
**Closing Date**: July 17, 2023 14:00:00

**Procurement Category**: Service (SRV)

**Trade Agreements**: This procurement is subject to the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

**Location**: The successful bidder will be required to work in Canada.

**Language of Notice**: English description with French translation
================================simplesste

Bid History
-----------

This consultation ended on July 17, 2023.

Tender Details
-------------

*   **Title: Junior Information/Records Management Specialist - TSPS 2.11**
*   **Description:** To provide experienced support in managing information and records, and to design and implement policies, procedures and frameworks to maintain GreenHouse Gas (GHG) records in a Canada wide travelling pool.
*   **No.JB837-17600:65150**
*   **Trade Agreements:** This procurement falls under the Canada OPS waiver 16-FC-633-02 (Source List annex 18).  The trade agreements that apply to this procurement are listed in the following trade agreements document:

*   **Province:** Ontario
*   **Postal Code:** K1A0E4
*   **Phone Number:** (343) 543-4785
